document_data.name: Jordy Gallum
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Jordy Gallum''' was the Count of [[Greenshores]] in [[Tethyr]] and that kingdom's Sheriffs' Chancellor.
document_data.Personality: Jordy Gallum had been described as "the epitome of a Greenshores man". He was thoughtful and peaceful but could become aggressive if his people were threatened. He loved the outdoors.
document_data.Relationships:
Jordy was longtime friends with both [[Tardeth Llanistaph]] and [[Marilyn Haresdown]] of the [[Company of Eight]]. He served with the latter while in the army of Tethyr before the [[Tethyrian Interregnum]]

Jordy was married to a woman from Mosstone named [[Shaern Gallum|Shaern]]. His younger brother, [[Emmakk Galum|Emmakk]] took over for him as constable of Mosstone after Jordy's promotion to count.
document_data.Activities: As Sheriffs' Chancellor of Tethyr, Lord Gallum was responsible for the oversight of all law-enforcement in the kingdom.
document_data.Holdings: Jordy ruled from [[Kirgard]], which had formerly been used to garrison troops for Mosstone and [[Port Kir]]. Neither Jordy nor his wife were comfortable living in the manor, since they had lived in Mosstone for over 40 years.
